metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14449 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A double-Free vulnerability exists in the XCF image rendering functionality of SDL2_image-2.0.2. A specially crafted XCF image can cause a Double-Free situation to occur. An attacker can display a specially crafted image to trigger this vulnerability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14449` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsdl2-image-2.0-0 - 2.0.3+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> code to free not present in sdl-image1.2

criterions.comment: libsdl2-image package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.3+dfsg1-1').
